Enclosing class:
Gui
 class Gui.MainPanel
extends com.gwtext.client.widgets.Panel

Class responsible for displaying all tools for loading, crating selection and visualisation.

Author:
Lukasz Pintal, Krzysztof Dobosz

Gui.MainPanel

public Gui.MainPanel()
Creator of MainPanel, sets parameters for displaying gwt-ext panels, makes instances of all subpanels and buttons and displays them.

getSlots

public void getSlots()

getDataViews

public void getDataViews(MetaID slotId)
Communicates asynchronously with metadata module and loads data view list aviable for current user and selected slot.

Parameters:
slot - selected slots MetaID

executeQuery

public void executeQuery(UserSelection selection)
Method responsible for communicating with database engine. Using asynchronous communication, passes current user selection and gets result of database query it contained. Result is displayed using Visualization class instance.

Parameters:
selection - current user selection
